value.title: New Field Icons in Power BI
value.excerpt: We can see different icons for our Power BI Fields. Had we ever tried to understand what's the meaning of each icon? Here's an answer. During this video, we will see new Field icons introduced in Power BI Desktop. Microsoft rolled out these new icons with the November 2020 Power BI Desktop update. Here,

value.title: Power Apps Visual for Power BI | Build Live Application with Power Apps Visual inside Power BI

We will talk the step by step procedure that you should know about the Power Apps visualization inside the Power BI.  First, we will build a Power BI report with the DirectQuery Mode of SQL Server. value.title: Power BI Goals - Create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to the Power BI Goals Step by Step Beginner tutorial series, During this session, we will talk about how to create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI. To get started with Goals we need to create a Scorecard in Power BI. Once ou scorecard is created, we can add the Goals within the same scorecard.

value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can stop the interaction between the visualization. In Power BI, whenever we select any visual data point, it filters other visuals based on the selected data point. Sometimes there is a requirement, where we don’t need the filtering functionality on selected data

value.title: Power Query Tip - Add Sequential Number using the Index Column in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn, how we can easily add the sequence for the rows using the PowerQuery. In Power Query we can add the sequence number using the Index. Let’s see how to add the Index column in the Power BI.  If you really like this video don’t forget to subscribe to my channel. ***************

value.title: Quickly create Power BI Report from SharePoint List  or Microsoft List
value.excerpt: We will learn how to quickly create our Power BI Report directly from SharePoint List or Microsoft Lists during this session. This is the first integration experience with Power BI. This experience empowers SharePoint list and Microsoft List users to easily explore their list data with just a few clicks.

With Relative Time Slicer, we can filter data based on the time.  Sometimes there are situations, where we need to filter

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

value.title: Bulk Assign Licenses in Office 365
value.excerpt: You may need to assign an O365 License to multiple users.  I show you how to do a bulk assign to multiple users.  With looking at the upcoming Power BI GA, this may be handy for assigning multiple Free licenses to your users, or Pro licenses.  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1
